actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Percy with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 568.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution calling for determined U.S. opposition to illegal actions by the so-called Turkish Federation of Cyprus.

summary.text: Urges the United States to: (1) oppose any action aimed at effecting a permanent bifurcation of Cyprus; and (2) call upon Turkey to take steps to reverse such illegal action and to promote the unity of the Republic of Cyprus.

titles.title: An original resolution calling for determined U.S. opposition to illegal actions by the so-called Turkish Federation of Cyprus.
